name: Roots
description:
Free Demo Above

Enjoy this relaxing play at your pace puzzle game where you must get all the fertilizer and reach the water. Play as the root of a plant and beat all the challenges.

Start off with simple fertilizer jumping puzzles, then learn of new power ups that make a twist on the game. Can you get your plant to maturity?

Developed over the course of one year on stream, I hope you enjoy this puzzle adventure.  Try out the demo if you would like to see how it plays.  Also available for free on mobile.
